name: Bordó
tagline: Dedicated to building value for brands.
description:
Bordó is an Argentinean integral communication agency. Put another way: a company that is dedicated to building value for brands.
It is composed of a great team that faces the most varied challenges every day. And it makes each of them a great communication project. Bordó is also a great project, which started almost 15 years ago, is still a dream of growth and fulfillment for all of us here, for all our customers and why not for all brands that are looking for a new way.
